project_abstract.cdata: The Beijing-Tianjin-Tanggu Expressway Project aims to assist the Government in meeting the road transport demand in one of the most important corridors in China, and increasing the efficiency and cost-effectiveness of the subsector.  The project is to be carried out under the overall responsibility of the Ministry of Communications (MOC) with an expressway company responsible for supervision of the expressway construction.  The project itself includes:  (a) construction of a 142 km, four-lane divided, controlled access, tolled expressway connecting Beijing and Tianjin with the new port of Xingang at Tanggu, as well as two connecting roads (12 km).  It also involves (b) consultants' services to help train the MOC's and the company's staff in the supervision and quality control of construction; (c) provision of road maintenance, operation and traffic monitoring equipment for the expressway; and (d) assistance in improving road planning by setting up a computerized road data bank.  Finally, the project entails (e) sector studies and (f) training of staff from MOC's Highway Bureau and the Provincial Highway Bureaus, in the areas of transport planning and other highway and transport-related topics.

P003448.projectinfo: <![CDATA[<Project><LangCode>ZH</LangCode><ProjectName>京津唐高速公路项目</ProjectName><ProjectAbstract>本项目旨在政府部门满足中国最重要交通干线之一沿线的道路交通需求，提高公路行业效率和成本效益。本项目由交通部全权负责实施，由一家高速公路公司负责高速公路施工监理工作。项目包括以下内容：（1）建设一条142公里长出入受管制的双向四车道分隔型收费高速公路，将北京、天津和塘沽新港连成一体，同时建设两条连接道（总长12公里）；（2）提供咨询服务，就施工监理和施工质量控制等内容帮助针对交通部和高速公路公司人员开展培训；（3）提供高速公路养护、运行和交通量监测设备；（4）协助通过建立计算机化公路数据库改进公路规划工作；（5）开展行业研究；（6）就交通规划及其它公路和交通相关内容向交通部公路局人员提供培训。</ProjectAbstract></Project>]]>
